title: Sunbird in Purple Orchids
medium: Watercolor on Arches Cold Pressed 100% Cotton
description: A vibrant celebration of tropical beauty featuring a delicate sunbird perched among striking purple orchids in full bloom. Rich jewel-toned purples and deep violets create dramatic depth across the orchid's petals, while blue-green leaves flow gracefully through the composition.
